snippet: Oregon State Hospital features a museum that pays tribute to the movie “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” and explores mental health treatments of the past.
abstract: Salem Journal; Oregon State Hospital in Salem features a museum that pays tribute to the movie One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest, which was filmed there in the 1970s; it is one of the few mental health museums around the world that are part of a still functioning hospital; museum explores mental health treatments of the past, good and bad.
lead_paragraph: Oregon State Hospital features a museum that pays tribute to the movie “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” and explores mental health treatments of the past.

headline.seo: ‘Cuckoo’s Nest’ Hospital Is Now a Museum
headline.main: Once a ‘Cuckoo’s Nest,’ Now a Museum
